_comments.cssReload: If true, the page will reload when CSS changes are detected. If false, CSS changes will be applied without reloading.

jsReload.smart: Checks for duplicate injections and reloads the page only if necessary.
jsReload.true: Always reloads the page when JavaScript changes are made.
jsReload.false: Never reloads the page when JavaScript changes are made.

_comments.vite: If true, the project will use Vite for building and serving. If false, it will use the default setup.
